00026 
00027 bool GMXTrajectoryReader::Open(const string &file)
00028 {
00029        _filename = file;
00030        return true;
00031 }
00032 
00033 void GMXTrajectoryReader::Close()
00034 {
00035     close_trx(_gmx_status);
00036 }
00037 
00038 bool GMXTrajectoryReader::FirstFrame(Topology &conf)
00039 {
00040     set_program_name("VOTCA");
00041 
00042 #if GMX == 50
00043 
00044     output_env_t oenv;
00045     // _snew("oenv", oenv, 1);
00046     oenv = (output_env_t)malloc(sizeof(*oenv));
00047     output_env_init_default (oenv);
00048 
00049     if(!read_first_frame(oenv, &_gmx_status,(char*)_filename.c_str(),&_gmx_frame,TRX_READ_X | TRX_READ_V | TRX_READ_F))
00050         throw std::runtime_error(string("cannot open ") + _filename);
00051     //sfree(oenv);
00052     free(oenv);
00053 #elif GMX == 45
00054     output_env_t oenv;
00055     // _snew("oenv", oenv, 1);
00056     oenv = (output_env_t)malloc(sizeof(*oenv));
00057     output_env_init_default (oenv);
00058 
00059     if(!read_first_frame(oenv, &_gmx_status,(char*)_filename.c_str(),&_gmx_frame,TRX_READ_X | TRX_READ_V | TRX_READ_F))
00060         throw std::runtime_error(string("cannot open ") + _filename);
00061     //sfree(oenv);
00062     free(oenv);
00063 #elif GMX == 40
00064     if(!read_first_frame(&_gmx_status,(char*)_filename.c_str(),&_gmx_frame,TRX_READ_X  | TRX_READ_V | TRX_READ_F))
00065         throw std::runtime_error(string("cannot open ") + _filename);
00066 #else
00067 #error Unsupported GMX version
00068 #endif
00069 
00070     matrix m;
00071     for(int i=0; i<3; i++)
00072         for(int j=0; j<3; j++)
00073             m[i][j] = _gmx_frame.box[j][i];
00074     conf.setBox(m);
00075     conf.setTime(_gmx_frame.time);
00076     conf.setStep(_gmx_frame.step);
00077     cout << endl;
00078     
00079     if(_gmx_frame.natoms != (int)conf.Beads().size())
00080         throw std::runtime_error("number of beads in trajectory do not match topology");
00081 
00082     //conf.HasPos(true);
00083     //conf.HasF(_gmx_frame.bF);
00084     
00085     for(int i=0; i<_gmx_frame.natoms; i++) {
00086         double r[3] = { _gmx_frame.x[i][XX],  _gmx_frame.x[i][YY], _gmx_frame.x[i][ZZ] };
00087         conf.getBead(i)->setPos(r);
00088         if(_gmx_frame.bF) {
00089             double f[3] = { _gmx_frame.f[i][XX],  _gmx_frame.f[i][YY], _gmx_frame.f[i][ZZ] };        
00090             conf.getBead(i)->setF(f);
00091         }
00092         if(_gmx_frame.bV) {
00093             double v[3] = { _gmx_frame.v[i][XX],  _gmx_frame.v[i][YY], _gmx_frame.v[i][ZZ] };
00094             conf.getBead(i)->setVel(v);
00095         }
00096     }
00097     return true;
00098 }
00099 
00100 bool GMXTrajectoryReader::NextFrame(Topology &conf)
00101 {
00102 #if GMX == 50
00103     output_env_t oenv;
00104     //_snew("oenv", oenv, 1);
00105     oenv = (output_env_t)malloc(sizeof(*oenv));
00106     output_env_init_default (oenv);
00107     if(!read_next_frame(oenv, _gmx_status,&_gmx_frame))
00108         return false;
00109     //sfree(oenv);
00110     free(oenv);
00111 #elif GMX == 45
00112     output_env_t oenv;
00113     //_snew("oenv", oenv, 1);
00114     oenv = (output_env_t)malloc(sizeof(*oenv));
00115     output_env_init_default (oenv);
00116     if(!read_next_frame(oenv, _gmx_status,&_gmx_frame))
00117         return false;
00118     //sfree(oenv);
00119     free(oenv);
00120 #elif GMX == 40
00121     if(!read_next_frame(_gmx_status,&_gmx_frame))
00122         return false;
00123 #else
00124 #error Unsupported GMX version
00125 #endif
00126 
00127     matrix m;
00128     for(int i=0; i<3; i++)
00129         for(int j=0; j<3; j++)
00130             m[i][j] = _gmx_frame.box[j][i];
00131     conf.setTime(_gmx_frame.time);
00132     conf.setStep(_gmx_frame.step);
00133     conf.setBox(m);
00134     
00135     //conf.HasF(_gmx_frame.bF);
00136     
00137     for(int i=0; i<_gmx_frame.natoms; i++) {
00138         double r[3] = { _gmx_frame.x[i][XX],  _gmx_frame.x[i][YY], _gmx_frame.x[i][ZZ] };
00139         conf.getBead(i)->setPos(r);
00140         if(_gmx_frame.bF) {
00141             double f[3] = { _gmx_frame.f[i][XX],  _gmx_frame.f[i][YY], _gmx_frame.f[i][ZZ] };        
00142             conf.getBead(i)->setF(f);
00143         }
00144         if(_gmx_frame.bV) {
00145             double v[3] = { _gmx_frame.v[i][XX],  _gmx_frame.v[i][YY], _gmx_frame.v[i][ZZ] };
00146             conf.getBead(i)->setVel(v);
00147         }
00148 
00149 
00150     }
00151     return true;
00152 }
